long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The #1 website and porn blocker Chrome plugin. Block distracting and inappropriate sites like Facebook, YouTube, Reddit and any NSFW content with this easy to use extension.

Stay focused and productive by customizing blocked sites and scheduled access. Get back hours of your time and take control of your browsing. Download now to stop procrastination and improve productivity. 

This powerful extension is the top-rated website blocker that helps you stay focused by restricting access to time-wasting sites.
